channel.title: Anyone have client that works for ALL servers?
channel.description:
i need a client that works for all servers.
One where you can set the IP adress like mopar but a higher quality one.
I TRIED SILAB, DON'T WORK

item.title: Anyone have client that works for ALL servers?
item.dc:creator: @SRNscape SRNscape
item.description:
@SRNscape wrote:

shut the fuck up its fucking possible it just wont show those items and read what i said i want it to work for my server, no custom and quit posting SHIT i dont need to know because i allready know about the custom item SHIT so stop being a pmsing bitch pl0x.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone have client that works for ALL servers?
item.dc:creator: @SRNscape SRNscape
item.description:
@SRNscape wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:19, topic:264092”][quote author=SRNscape link=topic=348725.msg2682056#msg2682056 date=1235432948]
i need a client that works for all servers.

One where you can set the IP adress like mopar but a higher quality one.

I TRIED SILAB, DON’T WORK
[/quote]
Impossible, because you would have to have every cache and every model packed in one client, and the programing process would strife; therefore this would be imposable to nearly imposable.[/quote]

this is not impossible i have used a client that worked that well before for about 90% of servers, just didnt do well on allstar type, but i asked for this client because i am making a server and dont have time to make a client im only on comp 1-2 times a week.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 27, 2009, 04:15:45 pm[/size][hr]skittle thanks i tried your client but it doesnt work for this source i might use another though so thanks still.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone have client that works for ALL servers?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“SRNscape, post:1, topic:264092”]i need a client that works for all servers.

One where you can set the IP adress like mopar but a higher quality one.

I TRIED SILAB, DON’T WORK[/quote]

Impossible, because you would have to have every cache and every model packed in one client, and the programing process would strife; therefore this would be imposable to nearly imposable.

Dude, you really got some nerve. You come on moparscape to ask a question everyone is helping. Your just to lazy to go learn a thing or two maybe you should consider looking at some of the tutorials. And also jc and the other people are trying to help you and your just giving them problems if your going to ask such a simple question don’t get mad if you get a simple answer.

DIDNT I JUST SAY dont post unless you have something usefull to say. i meant something that pertains to my question. and you apparently didn’t read the whole of the posts because i apologized and said “thanks”

AND i asked him where i can learn something new so read the whole thing next time. (again)

@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“SRNscape, post:8, topic:264092”]i 2nd that you stop posting stuff i just told you not to.

BTW how would i learn that? oh yea i would look up a guide.

A GUIDE IS SOME1 ELSES WORK

unless i was the inventor of all this stuff i will have to rely on some1 elses work.

unless you know a good client or a good guide to show me how to make one, stop posting on here.[/quote]
